text: decision has 200 customers in 11
countries and for this reason for us is
a key to have a cloud provider that
allows us to scale in all different
countries so AWS is a great solution in
this case my name is Kimo palmisano I'm
vice president of the decision ioe
platform the decision is a software
multinational company that allows big
Corporation to create the so-called
internet of everything framework when we
decided to jump into the cloud uh B2B
software word uh we decided to to use
AWS for different reason first one was
the pricing model we found it very
useful and very practical considering
the amount of data that we were going to
consume the second reason was AWS is
software independent being a software
company we were looking for something
that was independent and we have the
capability to scale fast into the market
and demonstrate our value uh without any
kind of restriction of the building
block we can use in order to provide
value to our partners or to our final
customers and another important reason
was the scalability elasticity of the
cloud environment because we get data
from structured and unstructured sources
like social data collaboration data as
well as data from Erp systems so those
are not controllable data most of the
times you don't know the size you don't
know the complexity so elasticity and
flexibility were were the two key words
we were looking for in our cloud
provider the workloads we are generating
are uh 300 GB of storage in data
structur and unstructured data uh we
also allow 1,000 users in real time to
work on our front end and those 1,000
users are generating 200 requests per
second during the working days one of
the most important solution that we have
created with decision and that runs
completely in AWS is a supply chain uh
vendor management solution that is
running for one of our pharmaceutical uh
customer this use case allows the Pharma
company to have a collaborative
framework that runs on three different
continents with 500 people that are
collaborating around different kind of
data those people is able to get data
from vendors that are coming from
scorecards that are coming from surveys
as well as from production environments
and we connect all this data also uh
with contextual information and brand
reputation information that are coming
from the web at the end of 2014 one of
our system integrator partner us asked
us for creating a Business Solution on
decision for a smart Wind Farm uh the
idea was to connect data coming from 300
sensors on windmills together with Erp
data and enabling uh 10 different
departments in order to make
collaboration and decide when to do
maintenance uh on the field in the
future we are going to do more of those
projects and business Solutions we are
going to use AWS as much as possible to
enable all the building blocks we need
having a f tolerant architecture is a
key uh to make our customer happy
